sqlMap.insert: insert into report1 (no, reporter, accused, category, content, rdate, status) values (report_seq.nextval, #reporter#, #accused#, #category#, #content#, sysdate, #status#)
sqlMap.select: select no, reporter, accused, category, content, rdate, status from report1 where status=#status# order by rdate
